input: A song about the calmness of the ocean and peace.
output:
Here are some potential song title ideas based on your input:

1. **"Ocean Serenity"**: This title captures the peaceful and calming atmosphere of the ocean, evoking feelings of tranquility and relaxation.
2. **"Tides of Tranquility"**: This title plays on the idea of the ocean's tides, yet replaces chaos with serenity, creating a soothing and calming vibe.
3. **"Deep Blue Peace"**: This title emphasizes the depth and vastness of the ocean, while also highlighting its peaceful qualities.
4. **"Serenity of the Deep"**: This title has a mystical, almost poetic feel to it, suggesting a connection to something deeper and more profound than the surface level.
5. **"Peaceful Waves"**: Simple yet effective, this title conveys the calming, soothing quality of ocean waves.
6. **"Oceanic Solace"**: This title emphasizes the idea that the ocean can be a source of comfort and solace in times of need or uncertainty.
7. **"The Calm Below"**: This title suggests that there is more to the ocean than meets the eye, and that beneath its surface lies a deep sense of peace and tranquility.

I hope one of these titles sparks your creativity and helps you get started on your songwriting project!
